sqlMap.select: SELECT AppVersion, DefaultCurrencyID, CurrencyPrecision, ReportsInBrowswer, ConsoleDefaultOpen, WalletEnabled as EnableWallet, SpendPassword, DefaultBsvCurrencyMethod, DefaultBsvCurrencyID FROM AppSettings;
